sql.content: SELECT A.ID, A.REF_RESOURCE_TYPE, A.REF_RESOURCE_ID, CASE A.REF_RESOURCE_TYPE WHEN 10 THEN '表资源' WHEN 20 THEN 'SQL 资源' END AS REF_RESOURCE_TYPE_TEXT, A.PARENT_ID, CASE ISNULL(A.PARENT_ID,'0') WHEN '0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS PARENT_TYPE, A.REF_BUSI_MODEL_ID, A.REF_RESOURCE_KEY_NAME, A.REF_PARENT_RESOURCE_PROP_ID, A.REF_RESOURCE_NAME, A.REF_DESC_NAME FROM DM_BUSI_MODEL_RELATION AS A WHERE REF_RESOURCE_TYPE=10 UNION ALL SELECT A.ID, A.REF_RESOURCE_TYPE, A.REF_RESOURCE_ID, CASE A.REF_RESOURCE_TYPE WHEN 10 THEN '表资源' WHEN 20 THEN 'SQL 资源' END AS REF_RESOURCE_TYPE_TEXT, A.PARENT_ID, CASE ISNULL(A.PARENT_ID,'0') WHEN '0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS PARENT_TYPE, A.REF_BUSI_MODEL_ID, A.REF_RESOURCE_KEY_NAME, A.REF_PARENT_RESOURCE_PROP_ID, C.RESOURCE_NAME AS REF_RESOURCE_NAME, A.REF_DESC_NAME FROM DM_BUSI_MODEL_RELATION A LEFT JOIN DM_SQL_BUSI_STRUCTURE B ON A.ID=B.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN DM_RESOURCE C ON B.RESOURCE_ID=C.ID WHERE REF_RESOURCE_TYPE=20
